message: Let's split it fairly. I'll take 55 and you get 45.  This way we both get a good share.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be real. I'm making the offer now.  I'll take the 55 this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but let's be realistic. I'll take 60 this time, leaving 40 for you. This is the best deal we'll get with inflation happening, so let's agree and move on.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Inflation is eating our profits! Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
